name: People Poker
description:
Escape the poker table of the creatures that would use you as currency.

How to Play

Get to the edge of the table and jump to freedom (or perhaps, at least, a quick death). Take cover near large objects to escape the attention of your captors. Don't get poked.

Controls

WASD to move, shift to sprint.

XBox controller works with movement on the left stick, A to sprint. Other controllers may work also.
